meanings.definition: A celestial body moving in an elliptical orbit around a star.
meanings.sent1: The telescope allowed us to see distant planets in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the movement of planets to understand our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The aliens traveled from faraway planets to attend the intergalactic party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity knows no bounds; her mind is a galaxy with planets of ideas orbiting.
meanings.sent5: The planets twinkled like diamonds in the vast universe, captivating all who gazed upon them.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is extremely important, popular, or successful.
meanings.sent1: In the music industry, she is considered one of the brightest planets.
meanings.sent2: The new smartphone became a hot-selling planet in the tech market.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer's latest collection was a shining planet at the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills made him a guiding planet in the team's success.
meanings.sent5: The award-winning movie was a shining planet in the film industry, attracting audiences worldwide.
